name: Sign Up Flow - 1 Month
description: This test verifies the web sign up flow for a 1 month product

steps.name: Verify that the homepage loaded correctly
Click join us on the homepage
Verify that the service type page has loaded correctly
Select mobile plan in the sign up flow
Verify plan selection page.
Change the plan and verify that the correct amount is reflected in the plan price
Click continue btn on the plan selection page
Verify that the promo page is loaded
Click monthly plan on the promo screen
Verify number selection page heading, confirm/reject btn and MNP link
Select confirm btn
Verify that the account creation page has loaded and header / btn is displayed.
Create an account using a randomly generated email
Verify ID type page
Select EID as the ID option
Verify the address page header, searchbar and map
Enter delivery address in search bar.
Verify delivery details page header and building options
Enter the address details and click continue
Verify all payment elements are loaded and displayed on the screen
Agree to terms and proceed to payment
Verify payment page header, credit/debit, google pay and POD
